title: 92/484/EEC: Commission Decision of 22 September 1992 fixing the aid for private storage of carcases and half- carcases of lamb in connection with the invitations to tender issued pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 2592/92
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 22 September 1992  fixing the aid for private storage of carcases and half-carcases of lamb in connection with the invitations to tender issued pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 2592/92  (92/484/EEC)
THE COMMISSION  OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The aid referred to in Article 12 (1) (f) of Regulation (EEC) No 3446/90 for the invitations to tender opened by Regulation (EEC) No 2592/92 shall be as follows: ECU 1 050 per tonne.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 September 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 289, 7. 10. 1989, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 215, 30. 7. 1992, p. 59. (3) OJ No L 333, 30. 11. 1990, p. 39. (4) OJ No L 120, 15. 5. 1991, p. 15. (5) OJ No L 333, 30. 11. 1990, p. 46. (6) OJ No L 259, 5. 9. 1992, p. 18.
